body_html:
Sir the following test cases take cover exhaustive cases for the combination of center with zero_debias_moving_mean parameter.
Please verify.
Test Case 1:
import tensorflow as tf
a = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, shape=(10, 10, 10, 10))
b = tf.contrib.layers.batch_norm(a, center=False, data_format='NCHW',
zero_debias_moving_mean=True)
sess = tf.Session()
sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())

Test Case 2:
import tensorflow as tf
a = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, shape=(10, 10, 10, 10))
b = tf.contrib.layers.batch_norm(a, center=False, data_format='NCHW',
zero_debias_moving_mean=False)
sess = tf.Session()
sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())

Test Case 3:
import tensorflow as tf
a = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, shape=(10, 10, 10, 10))
b = tf.contrib.layers.batch_norm(a, center=True, data_format='NCHW',
zero_debias_moving_mean=True)
sess = tf.Session()
sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())

Test Case 4:
import tensorflow as tf
a = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, shape=(10, 10, 10, 10))
b = tf.contrib.layers.batch_norm(a, center=True, data_format='NCHW',
zero_debias_moving_mean=False)
sess = tf.Session()
sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())

body:
Sir the following test cases take cover exhaustive cases for the combination of center with zero_debias_moving_mean parameter.
Please verify.
Test Case 1:
import tensorflow as tf
a = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, shape=(10, 10, 10, 10))
b = tf.contrib.layers.batch_norm(a, center=False, data_format='NCHW',
                                 zero_debias_moving_mean=True)
sess = tf.Session()
sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())

Test Case 2:
import tensorflow as tf
a = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, shape=(10, 10, 10, 10))
b = tf.contrib.layers.batch_norm(a, center=False, data_format='NCHW',
                                 zero_debias_moving_mean=False)
sess = tf.Session()
sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())

Test Case 3:
import tensorflow as tf
a = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, shape=(10, 10, 10, 10))
b = tf.contrib.layers.batch_norm(a, center=True, data_format='NCHW',
                                 zero_debias_moving_mean=True)
sess = tf.Session()
sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())

Test Case 4:
import tensorflow as tf
a = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, shape=(10, 10, 10, 10))
b = tf.contrib.layers.batch_norm(a, center=True, data_format='NCHW',
                                 zero_debias_moving_mean=False)
sess = tf.Session()
sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())
